item.description:
This event will include presentations by three distinguished scholars from Ben Gurion University:

Professor David Faiman on Solar Energy
Professor Isaac Meir on "Green" Architecture
Professor Zeev Wiesman on Biofuels

You are welcome to attend the Luncheon Symposium at 12:00pm at Foley Hoag's Emerging Enterprise Center (Waltham), or the Evening Symposium at 7:00pm at Temple Ohabei Shalom (Brookline).

Please see http://www.boston-isr... for complete details, including speakers' bios.

This event is being organized in collaboration with the American Associates of Ben Gurion University (AABGU). Please also RSVP to aabgu_ne@aabgu.org or 617-232-2300 and mention that you are a member of the Boston Israel Cleantech Alliance.
item.name: Seeking Sustainability: An Environmental Symposium featuring experts from Israel
